sentences.en: Catching colds is unfortunately an occupational hazard in this profession.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，容易感冒是这个行业的职业性风险。

sentences.en: Catching sight of the dog, he broke into a run.
sentences.cn: 他一看见那只狗, 就赶紧跑.

sentences.en: Catching to fashion is not essential to the happiness of all women.
sentences.cn: 赶时髦对所有妇女的幸福并非都是必要的.

sentences.en: Getting your feet wet disposes you to catching cold.
He was instrumental in catching the criminal.
sentences.cn: 在捉拿那个罪犯的过程中,他起了作用.

sentences.en: I can play around with the pictures to make them more eye-catching.
sentences.cn: 我可以尝试用不同的方式排列这些图片以使它们更加吸引眼球。

sentences.en: I was catching up on a bit of reading.
sentences.cn: 当时我在忙着读些东西。

sentences.en: I wouldn't like to be tied to catching the last train home.
sentences.cn: 我不想非得赶最后一趟列车回家。
朱莉娅的热情很有感染力。

sentences.en: Police say they are confident of catching the gunman.
sentences.cn: 警方说他们有信心抓住那个持枪歹徒。

sentences.en: The idea has been around for ages without catching on.
sentences.cn: 这个观点已经提出来有年头了，可是一直没被广泛接受。

sentences.en: The Indians came out unexpectedly, catching the soldiers off-guard.
sentences.cn: 印第安人突如其来地出现，令士兵们猝不及防。

sentences.en: They saw the ship's guns, catching the light of the moon.
sentences.cn: 他们看到船上的大炮在月光下熠熠生辉。

sentences.en: We allowed a margin of 20 minutes in catching the train.
sentences.cn: 我们有20分钟的余地赶火车.

sentences.en: You are in danger of catching cold.

words.tran_cn: 引人注意的；容易记住的；易使人上当的

phrases.tran_cn: 打捞工具；选择全部；设立预设帐号
试图抓住；死命抓住；渴望获得
发觉自己讲错而突然住嘴

trans.tran_en: an illness that is catching is easily passed to other people

trans.tran_cn: 抓住( catch的现在分词)，赶上
